== Ezhome (CT) (627223) ==

Ezhome (CT) is a town in the [[Kannur]] taluka of [[Kannur]] district with an area of 18.9 sq. km. and harbouring 4297 households with total population of 19261 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kannur]] is at a distance of 26 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 538 km. Male population is 8716 and female population is 10545. Scheduled Caste population is 1729 and Scheduled Tribes population is 33. Census Location Code of the town is 627223<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (population_total 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kanhangad  (m + og) at a distance of 42 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 102 km. Railway station is at Pazhayangadi at a distance of 14 km.
